abstract: Disc 1: The Leaving--Family plan--Rough justice--Facing up. Disc 2: Oh what a night--Special features
description: Episode of Series "Bad girls. Series two". The Leaving: (wri. Jayne Hollinson, dir. Mike Adams): Shell's back on enhanced and is targetting Barbara. Dominic and Zandra are drawn closer through her illness. Denny and Crystal get a new roommate in the young Shaz. "Family plan" (wri. Phil Ford, dir. Mike Adams): Shaz explains to Denny the circumstances of her triple murder charge. Barbara confesses to the attack on Shell. Julie's trying to have another baby and someone from Yvonne's past is the latest addtion to the ward. Babes behind bars go under. "Rough justice" (wri. Ann McManus, dir. Mike Adams): Renee's got it in for everyone and dies under mysterious circumstances. Sylvia is reprimanded over an incident involving Denny and Shaz. Fenner's having family troubles. "Facing up" (wri. Maureen Chadwick, dir. Laurence Moody): Jim's mind isn't on the job, to the detriment of his fellow officers. Nikki's jealous of Helen and Dominic, Helen has a plan to make Shaz realise the consequence of her actions. "Oh what a night" (wri. Maureen Chadwick, Ann McManus, dir. Laurence Moody): Nikki will do anything to spend one night with Helen on the eve of a party to celebrate Sylvia's 30 years in the service. Crystal leaves Lark Hall.
